import { Button, Container, FadeIn } from '../S' import { Coffee } from '../Icons/ThemeIcon' import { HeaderWrapper, HeaderTag, Nav, Span, NavList, NavItem, Logo } from './Header.styled' import Link from 'next/link' import styled from 'styled-components' import useTranslation from '../../hooks/useTranslation.js' const Header = ({ title, theme, isHeb, children }) => { const { t } = useTranslation() console.log( t('metaTitle') ); const Tip = t('tipButton') return (
nCorona {children} { isHeb && }
) } export default Header
